User instruction: 创建新文档并添加标题"项目风险评估"，设置字体为"Microsoft YaHei"。
Feasible API sequence: create_and_save_docx(doc_path, "");add_heading(doc_path, "项目风险评估", level=1);set_font_style("Microsoft YaHei");

User instruction: 添加目录，并设置为三级目录。
���加二级标题"风险识别"、"风险分析"和"应对措施"。
Feasible API sequence: add_heading(doc_path, "风险识别", level=2);add_heading(doc_path, "风险分析", level=2);add_heading(doc_path, "应对措施", level=2);

User instruction: 在"风险分析"下插入一个矩阵图展示风险等级。
Feasible API sequence: add_table(doc_path, 4, 4);set_cell_text(table, 0, 0, "影响程度/发生概率");set_cell_text(table, 0, 1, "低");set_cell_text(table, 0, 2, "中");set_cell_text(table, 0, 3, "高");

User instruction: 在"风险识别"下添加��编号的列表项。
Feasible API sequence: add_list_item(doc_path, "技术风险", style="List Number");add_list_item(doc_path, "市场风险", style="List Number");add_list_item(doc_path, "管理风险", style="List Number");add_list_item(doc_path, "资源风险", style="List Number");

User instruction: 在"应对措施"下添加一个5行3列的表格。
Feasible API sequence: add_table(doc_path, 5, 3);set_cell_text(table, 0, 0, "风险类型");set_cell_text(table, 0, 1, "应对策略");set_cell_text(table, 0, 2, "责任人");
